00022 #region Usings
00023 using System;
00024 using System.Collections.Generic;
00025 using System.Xml;
00026 #endregion
00027 
00028 namespace Utilities.Web.Netflix
00029 {
00033     public class Title
00034     {
00035         #region Constructor
00036 
00041         public Title(XmlElement Element)
00042         {
00043             Categories = new List<string>();
00044             foreach (XmlNode Children in Element.ChildNodes)
00045             {
00046                 if (Children.Name.Equals("id", StringComparison.CurrentCultureIgnoreCase))
00047                 {
00048                     ID = Children.InnerText;
00049                 }
00050                 else if (Children.Name.Equals("title", StringComparison.CurrentCultureIgnoreCase))
00051                 {
00052                     TitleInformation = new TitleInformation((XmlElement)Children);
00053                 }
00054                 else if (Children.Name.Equals("box_art", StringComparison.CurrentCultureIgnoreCase))
00055                 {
00056                     BoxArt = new BoxArt((XmlElement)Children);
00057                 }
00058                 else if (Children.Name.Equals("release_year", StringComparison.CurrentCultureIgnoreCase))
00059                 {
00060                     ReleaseYear = Children.InnerText;
00061                 }
00062                 else if (Children.Name.Equals("runtime", StringComparison.CurrentCultureIgnoreCase))
00063                 {
00064                     RunTime = int.Parse(Children.InnerText);
00065                 }
00066                 else if (Children.Name.Equals("average_rating", StringComparison.CurrentCultureIgnoreCase))
00067                 {
00068                     AverageRating = double.Parse(Children.InnerText);
00069                 }
00070 
00071                 else if (Children.Name.Equals("category", StringComparison.CurrentCultureIgnoreCase))
00072                 {
00073                     if (Children.Attributes["scheme"] != null
00074                         && (Children.Attributes["scheme"].Value.Equals("http://api.netflix.com/categories/mpaa_ratings",
00075                             StringComparison.CurrentCultureIgnoreCase)
00076                             || Children.Attributes["scheme"].Value.Equals("http://api.netflix.com/categories/tv_ratingss",
00077                             StringComparison.CurrentCultureIgnoreCase)))
00078                     {
00079                         Rating = Children.Attributes["label"].Value;
00080                     }
00081                     else if (Children.Attributes["scheme"].Value.Equals("http://api.netflix.com/categories/genres",
00082                         StringComparison.CurrentCultureIgnoreCase))
00083                     {
00084                         Categories.Add(Children.Attributes["label"].Value);
00085                     }
00086                 }
00087                 else if (Children.Name.Equals("link", StringComparison.CurrentCultureIgnoreCase))
00088                 {
00089                     if (Children.Attributes["rel"] != null
00090                         && Children.Attributes["rel"].Value.Equals("http://schemas.netflix.com/catalog/titles/synopsis",
00091                             StringComparison.CurrentCultureIgnoreCase))
00092                     {
00093                         SynopsisLink = Children.Attributes["href"].Value;
00094                     }
00095                     else if (Children.Attributes["rel"] != null
00096                         && Children.Attributes["rel"].Value.Equals("http://schemas.netflix.com/catalog/people.cast",
00097                             StringComparison.CurrentCultureIgnoreCase))
00098                     {
00099                         CastLink = Children.Attributes["href"].Value;
00100                     }
00101                     else if (Children.Attributes["rel"] != null
00102                         && Children.Attributes["rel"].Value.Equals("http://schemas.netflix.com/catalog/people.directors",
00103                             StringComparison.CurrentCultureIgnoreCase))
00104                     {
00105                         DirectorsLink = Children.Attributes["href"].Value;
00106                     }
00107                     else if (Children.Attributes["rel"] != null
00108                         && Children.Attributes["rel"].Value.Equals("http://schemas.netflix.com/catalog/titles/format_availability",
00109                             StringComparison.CurrentCultureIgnoreCase))
00110                     {
00111                         FormatsAvailableLink = Children.Attributes["href"].Value;
00112                     }
00113                     else if (Children.Attributes["rel"] != null
00114                         && Children.Attributes["rel"].Value.Equals("http://schemas.netflix.com/catalog/titles/screen_formats",
00115                             StringComparison.CurrentCultureIgnoreCase))
00116                     {
00117                         ScreenFormatsLink = Children.Attributes["href"].Value;
00118                     }
00119                     else if (Children.Attributes["rel"] != null
00120                         && Children.Attributes["rel"].Value.Equals("http://schemas.netflix.com/catalog/titles/languages_and_audio",
00121                             StringComparison.CurrentCultureIgnoreCase))
00122                     {
00123                         LanguagesLink = Children.Attributes["href"].Value;
00124                     }
00125                     else if (Children.Attributes["rel"] != null
00126                         && Children.Attributes["rel"].Value.Equals("http://schemas.netflix.com/catalog/titles.similars",
00127                             StringComparison.CurrentCultureIgnoreCase))
00128                     {
00129                         SimilarTitleLink = Children.Attributes["href"].Value;
00130                     }
00131                     else if (Children.Attributes["rel"] != null
00132                         && Children.Attributes["rel"].Value.Equals("alternate",
00133                             StringComparison.CurrentCultureIgnoreCase))
00134                     {
00135                          this.NetflixWebPage= Children.Attributes["href"].Value;
00136                     }
00137                     else if (Children.Attributes["rel"] != null
00138                         && Children.Attributes["rel"].Value.Equals("http://schemas.netflix.com/catalog/titles.series",
00139                             StringComparison.CurrentCultureIgnoreCase))
00140                     {
00141                         this.SeriesLink = Children.Attributes["href"].Value;
00142                     }
00143                     else if (Children.Attributes["rel"] != null
00144                         && Children.Attributes["rel"].Value.Equals("http://schemas.netflix.com/catalog/programs",
00145                             StringComparison.CurrentCultureIgnoreCase))
00146                     {
00147                         this.EpisodeLink = Children.Attributes["href"].Value;
00148                     }
00149                     else if (Children.Attributes["rel"] != null
00150                         && Children.Attributes["rel"].Value.Equals("http://schemas.netflix.com/catalog/titles/official_url",
00151                             StringComparison.CurrentCultureIgnoreCase))
00152                     {
00153                         this.StudioWebPage = Children.Attributes["href"].Value;
00154                     }
00155                 }
00156             }
00157         }
00158 
00159         #endregion
00160 
00161         #region Properties
00162 
00166         public string ID { get; set; }
00167 
00171         public TitleInformation TitleInformation { get; set; }
00172 
00176         public BoxArt BoxArt { get; set; }
00177 
00181         public string SynopsisLink { get; set; }
00182 
00186         public string ReleaseYear { get; set; }
00187 
00191         public string Rating { get; set; }
00192 
00196         public List<string> Categories { get; set; }
00197 
00201         public int RunTime { get; set; }
00202 
00206         public string CastLink { get; set; }
00207 
00211         public string DirectorsLink { get; set; }
00212 
00216         public string FormatsAvailableLink { get; set; }
00217 
00221         public string ScreenFormatsLink { get; set; }
00222 
00226         public string LanguagesLink { get; set; }
00227 
00231         public double AverageRating { get; set; }
00232 
00236         public string SimilarTitleLink { get; set; }
00237 
00241         public string NetflixWebPage { get; set; }
00242 
00246         public string StudioWebPage { get; set; }
00247 
00251         public string Awards { get; set; }
00252 
00256         public string BonusMaterial { get; set; }
00257 
00261         public string SeriesLink { get; set; }
00262 
00266         public string EpisodeLink { get; set; }
00267 
00271         public string SeasonLink { get; set; }
00272 
00273         #endregion
00274     }
